comments.body: Actually, this is hidden by `grammar-breaker`. We had better have a positive case to make it sure `fake-breaker` will work to be complete.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +144,148 @@        |FROM grammar-breaker
        |WHERE a-b > 10
        |GROUP BY fake-breaker
        |ORDER BY c
      """.stripMargin, 3, 12, 13, msg + " grammar-breaker")
